name: Columnable
description: Enables an element to construct a column layout.

attributes.name: columns
attributes.description: The desired total number of columns. Divs with a class of 'col' will be affected and scaled appropriately.

attributes.name: vSpace
attributes.description: The desired vertical space between columns. Divs with a class of 'col' will be affected and and given a margin-bottom matching the number provided.

attributes.name: hSpace
attributes.description: The desired vertical space between columns. Divs with a class of 'col' will be affected and and given a margin-bottom matching the number provided.
